title: OKEx Delists Monero, Dash, Zcash, Privacy-Cryptos Over FATF Demands
text:
OKEx Delists Monero, Dash, Zcash, Privacy-Cryptos Over FATF Demands

Cryptocurrency News 56 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 04:21AM ET)

OKEx Delists Monero, Dash, Zcash, Privacy-Cryptos Over FATF Demands The South Korean arm of cryptocurrency exchange OKEx is removing support for five major altcoins due to new international regulations. In a blog post originally published on Sept. 10, OKEx Korea confirmed it would halt trading of Monero (XMR), (DASH), Zcash (ZEC), Horizen (ZEN) and Super (SBTC) on Oct. 10. Continue Reading on Coin Telegraph

OKEx Delists Monero, Dash, Zcash, Privacy-Cryptos Over FATF Demands
